title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Database Utilization in a Flipped Learning Environment: Professional Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Database Concepts and SQL Query Understanding, Along with Basic Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply database design principles in a flipped learning environment to propose business process improvement strategies
Learners can complete a project analyzing and visualizing practical data using SQL
Learners can iteratively improve database solutions at least twice based on peer feedback in asynchronous learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
